text: @TeamPelosi Trump should be putting our children 1st instead of going golfing and lying to the American people about the Coronavirus and we definitely don't need him as POTUS for 4 more years  #MadamSpeaker or his 2nd term will be much worse I'm afraid to think about it and you are 100%right
